participant_1.background:
I remember buying a teddy bear for my grandmother when I was a child.
i tend to argue with myself more than i argue with myself.
I've been with myself for the longest time, and it's been a bumpy ride.
i like to try different beers from various countries.
I live in a small town in the Midwest where people are friendly and helpful.

participant_2.background:
I don't play an instrument but I enjoy listening to music, especially The Lumineers.
wedding cakes are my specialty.
My panda mug is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of my favorite animal.
i am the oldest of three boys.
I'm excited to try new recipes with my George Foreman grill.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Good, I'm making a wedding cake. What are you doing?
I'm tasting beers from different countries. I just tried one from Belgium.
That sounds delicious. I'm not a big beer drinker, but I do enjoy wine.
I love wine too. What are your favorite types of wine?
I like Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, and Shiraz.
Those are all good choices. I also like Pinot Noir.
That's a good one too. I've never tried a beer from Belgium. What's it called?
It's called Delirium Tremens. It's a strong beer, but it's also very delicious.
I'll have to try it sometime. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem. What kind of wedding cake are you making?
It's a chocolate cake with white buttercream frosting. It's going to be beautiful.
That sounds amazing. I'm sure it will be a hit at the wedding.
Thanks! I hope so.
I'm sure it will be. You're a great baker.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
I'm sure the bride and groom will love it.
I hope so. I'm excited to see their reaction.
I'm sure it will be great.
Thanks!
